CustomField.description:
The Start Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline start date of the project and its currently scheduled start date.
Start Variance = Start Date - Baseline Start Date
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Start Variance = Start Date - Baseline Start Date
The Start Variance field contains the amount of time that represents the difference between a baseline start date of the project and its currently scheduled start date.
CustomField.label: Start Variance
